b-c.trinket-colorizer.name: Trinket Colorizer
b-c.trinket-colorizer.description: Allows you to re-color trinkets, changing their appearance. Costs 15 omni geode per use.
config.DoInteractKey.name: Do Interaction
config.DoInteractKey.description: Press this key to interact with your companion, while you are close enough.
config.OpenTinkerInventoryKey.name: Open Tinker Inventory
config.OpenTinkerInventoryKey.descriptio: Press this key to open the inventory of your equipped trinket(s).
config.TinkerInventoryNextKey.name: Next Tinker Inventory
config.TinkerInventoryNextKey.descriptio: While a Tinker Inventory is open and multiple trinkets with inventory are equipped, press this to go to the next inventory.
config.TinkerInventoryPrevKey.name: Prev Tinker Inventory
config.TinkerInventoryPrevKey.descriptio: While a Tinker Inventory is open and multiple trinkets with inventory are equipped, press this to go to the previous inventory.
config.DrawDebugMode.name: Draw Debug Mode
config.DrawDebugMode.description: Enables drawing of companion frame number and bounding box, for debug purposes.
